description:
SMILES FOR MILES!

Keep your little one happy on the go with the Brica® Cruisin’™ Baby In-Sight® Entertainment Mirror. Choose the entertaining mode and your baby is introduced to patterns of light dancing behind the mirror in time to the lively songs. Long day and a tired baby? Switch to the soothing mode and let your child drift to sleep as relaxing music plays and the lights softly twinkle and fade in and out. Crash-tested and simple to install, this magical mirror provides entertainment for baby and peace of mind for you no matter where your day takes you.


	Captivating LED lights behind mirror light up and “dance” in entertaining mode and gently fade on and off in the soothing mode
	Clear-Sight™ mirror for superior reflection and a distortion-free image
	Remote lets you control the music, lights, and volume from the driver’s seat
	Up to 24 minutes of music available with eight high-quality, custom songs that are adult and kid-friendly
	Auto shut-off to conserve battery life
	Multiple attachment options securely fit most vehicles
	Crash-tested
	Requires 3 AA batteries – mirror includes batteries for “Try Me” purposes only
	Product Dimensions: L: 60 x W: 290 H: 210mm
name: Brica 1EA
